reviewText: This does not function on North American DVD's

Basilicata Coast to Coast is a kind of Armata Brancaleone of our times. I think Monicelli would permit me to make such an approach.  Lyrical sometimes, sometimes picaresque,  with a certain amount of naivet we were longing for, after so many "action" movies by Hollywood. Many thanks to Amazon for delivering  me this moving masterpiece.
